codes.name: Continue
codes.description: Waiting for the client to emit the body of the request.

codes.name: Switching Protocols
codes.description: The server has agreed to change protocol.

codes.name: Processing
codes.description: The server is processing the request, but no response is available yet. For WebDAV.

codes.name: Early Hints
codes.description: The server returns some response headers before the final HTTP message.

codes.name: OK
codes.description: Standard response for successful HTTP requests.

codes.name: Created
codes.description: The request has been fulfilled, resulting in the creation of a new resource.

codes.name: Accepted
codes.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

codes.name: Non-Authoritative Information
codes.description: The request is successful but the content has been modified by a transforming proxy.

codes.name: No Content
codes.description: The server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content.

codes.name: Reset Content
codes.description: The server indicates to reinitialize the document view.

codes.name: Partial Content
codes.description: The server is delivering only part of the resource.

codes.name: Multi-Status
codes.description: An XML message with multiple response codes. For WebDAV.

codes.name: Already Reported
codes.description: The members of a DAV binding have been enumerated already.

codes.name: IM Used
codes.description: The server fulfilled a request with the representation of the result.

codes.name: Multiple Choices
codes.description: Indicates multiple options for the resource.

codes.name: Moved Permanently
codes.description: Future requests should use the given URI.

codes.name: Found
codes.description: Redirect to another URL.

codes.name: See Other
codes.description: The response can be found under another URI.

codes.name: Not Modified
codes.description: The resource has not been modified.

codes.name: Use Proxy
codes.description: The requested resource is available only through a proxy.

codes.name: Switch Proxy
codes.description: No longer used.

codes.name: Temporary Redirect
codes.description: The request should repeat with another URI.

codes.name: Permanent Redirect
codes.description: All future requests should use another URI.

codes.name: Bad Request
codes.description: The server cannot or will not process the request.

codes.name: Unauthorized
codes.description: Authentication is required.

codes.name: Payment Required
codes.description: Reserved for future use.

codes.name: Forbidden
codes.description: The server is refusing action.

codes.name: Not Found
codes.description: The requested resource could not be found.

codes.name: Method Not Allowed
codes.description: The request method is not supported.

codes.name: Not Acceptable
codes.description: The resource generates content not acceptable.

codes.name: Proxy Authentication Required
codes.description: The client must authenticate with the proxy.

codes.name: Request Timeout
codes.description: The server timed out waiting for the request.

codes.name: Conflict
codes.description: The request could not be processed due to a conflict.

codes.name: Gone
codes.description: The resource is no longer available.

codes.name: Length Required
codes.description: The request did not specify content length.

codes.name: Precondition Failed
codes.description: A precondition in the request failed.

codes.name: Payload Too Large
codes.description: The request is larger than the server can process.

codes.name: URI Too Long
codes.description: The URI provided is too long for the server.

codes.name: Unsupported Media Type
codes.description: The server does not support the media type.

codes.name: Range Not Satisfiable
codes.description: The client requested a portion of the file that is not available.

codes.name: Expectation Failed
codes.description: The server cannot meet the Expect header requirement.

codes.name: I'm a teapot
codes.description: The server refuses to brew coffee in a teapot.

codes.name: Too Many Requests
codes.description: The user has sent too many requests in a short time.

codes.name: Internal Server Error
codes.description: A generic error message.

codes.name: Not Implemented
codes.description: The server does not recognize the request method.

codes.name: Bad Gateway
codes.description: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

codes.name: Service Unavailable
codes.description: The server is currently unavailable.

codes.name: Gateway Timeout
codes.description: The server did not receive a timely response.

codes.name: HTTP Version Not Supported
codes.description: The server does not support the HTTP protocol version.

codes.name: Network Authentication Required
codes.description: The client must authenticate to gain network access.
